name: Inperception (Virgilio Navarro Prada)
description:
"Inperception" is a first-person puzzle game about a Focuser, a special member of elite forces with the capability of altering his perception. His team has been ambushed and he needs to explore alone the enemy complex.

This prototype was made in only one month.  The authors are:  Álvaro Gil Migueláñez, Luis Antonio Lara Granado, Héctor Lotero Torres, Jorge Ruiz Gallego and Virgilio Navarro Prada.
